title: All the Way
description: Nice guy defenseman Nate has only ever had one girlfriend. Under the strict discipline of his Army father, hockey was everything. But after a hot as hell hook-up he falls for naughty, commitment shy make-up artist Beth. He wants to tame this wild girl and together they embark on an erotic ride neither of them will ever forget. Can Beth open her heart enough to let love in and can Nate overcome the demons of his past?
author: Emily Bunney
